resources.string: Search your favorite artist, album, song!!!

Here we will add a visual that shows a radio station as an old radio. Media player with android permition interner (stream) and wake_lock,as forjava define url new MediaPlayer with audiostreaming(set),datasource(set),prepare and start. Also add exceptions.
Here we will place a key pad with digits so the user will decides which radio station wants to connect. Grid layout on xml with colums and buttons
Here we will see the search results on a scrolling view

Here there will be shown a list with the Top 10 of Country. Also we will create a ListView on xml and on java we will define an Array with 10 values(links) to show the list view. Define a new adapter and assign it to the ListView adding a Listener

Here there will be shown a list with the Top 10 of Europe. Also we will create a ListView on xml and on java we will define an Array with 10 values(links) to show the list view. Define a new adapter and assign it to the ListView adding a Listener
